text: This is a list of former municipalities of Switzerland, i.e. municipalities of Switzerland (, , , ) that no longer exist. In 1850, Switzerland had 3203 municipalities. On 1 January 2015, the number was 2324.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz/Liste officielle des communes de la Suisse/Elenco ufficiale dei Comuni della Svizzera, 2006.
